content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's negotiate the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm starting with the price of 700 Euro. What do you say?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm shocked, Emilia! 700 Euro is way too low for my newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I'm greedy, remember? I'll accept 900 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I find your price too high.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Understandable, Emilia. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you find my price too high.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I start at 650 Euro. What do you say?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 650 Euro is an insult, Emilia! I'm a greedy landlord, remember? I'll accept 950 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you find my price too high.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand, Emilia. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you find my price too high.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I offer 800 Euro. What do you say?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 800 Euro is still too low, Emilia! I'm a greedy landlord, remember? I'll accept 980 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
